name: AllTimesPacific
description: A bot that curates Major League Baseball games to watch, with days off.

XMLSTATS_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: xmlstats access token for sports scheduling and results, available from https://erikberg.com/api

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_KEY.description: Twitter access token key, available from https://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Twitter access token secret, available from https://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Twitter consumer key, available from https://apps.twitter.com/

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Twitter consumer secret, available from https://apps.twitter.com/

EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Email address to send the token renewal reminder to.
